message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to us, I'm offering it to you for $100. This price reflects the quality and utility of the product, while also providing you with a great deal. I hope you find this offer appealing and look forward to your response.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $90 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your situation and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product. This price still reflects the value we place on the item while being more accommodating to your budget. I hope this proposal works for you and look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I appreciate your flexibility, I am still constrained by my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $92 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere between our positions and allows us to come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial solution. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $93 for the product. This price is slightly above your last offer but still within the range that reflects the value of the item. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can finalize the transaction.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a compromise. Based on my budget constraints, I am willing to offer $92 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable and we can move forward with the transaction.
